name: The Last Signs of Jax
description: Following Harlan's trail, you search for the last known signs of Jax before the bombs fell.

stages.name: Harlan's Trail Continues
stages.description: You've uncovered more clues about Jax's disappearance. Harlan's trail leads deeper into the Mojave.

stages.name: Investigate the Relay Station
stages.description: Harlan's note mentions a pre-war relay station where Jax was last seen. Travel there.

stages.name: Search for Evidence
stages.description: Search the relay station for signs of Jax.

stages.name: Play Harlan's Second Holotape
stages.description: Play the holotape found at the relay station.

stages.name: Follow the Blood Trail
stages.description: A faint blood trail leads away from the relay station. Follow it.

stages.name: Search the Medical Cache
stages.description: Search the abandoned medical cache for more clues.

stages.name: Quest Complete
stages.description: You've uncovered the last known signs of Jax before his disappearance.
